book.synopsis:
The worldwide bestseller that defines the band that defined an eraâ€•now updated and with 135 photographs and illustrations. In this behind-the-scenes look at the most famous musical group in history, Hunter Davies gives the complete story of the Beatles. As the only authorized biographer, Davies had full access to the group, as well as their help and encouragement. He spent eighteen months with them when they were at the peak of their musical genius and at the pinnacle of their popularity, and he remained friends with each of the members as they went their separate ways.

This updated edition addresses the changes in the lives of the Beatles: Paul
s death, and their new books and records. 135 photographs and illustrations
